content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_dark_oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "light_gray_terracotta", "quantity": 51, "index": 10}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_log", "quantity": 4, "index": 14}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 42, "index": 26}, {"type": "oak_wood", "quantity": 15, "index": 27}, {"type": "purpur_block", "quantity": 14, "index": 29}, {"type": "sunflower", "quantity": 8, "index": 31}, {"type": "music_disc_mellohi", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 15, "index": 36}, {"type": "acacia_leaves", "quantity": 23, "index": 43}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft stripped_dark_oak_wood. stripped_dark_oak_wood requires placing 1 stripped_dark_oak_log in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the stripped_dark_oak_log from slot 14 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_dark_oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "light_gray_terracotta", "quantity": 51, "index": 10}, {"type": "stripped_dark_oak_log", "quantity": 3, "index": 14}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 42, "index": 26}, {"type": "oak_wood", "quantity": 15, "index": 27}, {"type": "purpur_block", "quantity": 14, "index": 29}, {"type": "sunflower", "quantity": 8, "index": 31}, {"type": "music_disc_mellohi", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 15, "index": 36}, {"type": "acacia_leaves", "quantity": 23, "index": 43}]

thought: Since the stripped_dark_oak_log has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the stripped_dark_oak_log to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the stripped_dark_oak_log to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 2 with quantity 1
